Introduction

Jiseong is a South Korean rapper-songwriter and producer. He is a former member of the boy group NTX and the project boy group TAN and its sub-unit Shmallow.

In 2022, he participated in the survival show "Wild Idol" where he finished third place, qualifying him to debut as a member of TAN shortly after 4 years TAN disbanded in 2024.

On December 11, 2024, Victory Company announced that Jiseong left the group and the agency due to differences in the direction in which either party wanted to go.
